text:
This Patch will change all files to have Jetty Port and 
Jetty Admin Port configured within (local.)build.properties.

It also removed the -Djetty.port from the startup scripts lenya.sh
and lenya.bat.

Two new files added aswell: default-admin.xml / default-main.xml
creator: oliver.schalch@wyona.com
oliver.schalch@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 17759
Patchfile for all modified files

creator: michi@apache.org
text:
thanks for the patch, but I don't think it's a good idea that the lenya.sh and
lenya.bat are being patched during the build process. These files should read
the (local.)build.properties files in pull out the port from there.

Thanks

Michi

creator: michi@apache.org
text:
I have modified the propose patch and it seems to work fine on Linux, but it
needs to be tested on MacOS X and other Lunix platforms

Thanks

Michi

It would be good if someone could implement this for Windows as well.
It probably would make sense to write some Java helper and make it independent
of the platform.
creator: michi@apache.org

text:
No news from a long time.
Next versio based on maven, so dealing with jetty port will be different.
creator: florent.andre-dev@4sengines.com
